verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the Verses of the Book; a Quran that makes things clear.
verse.verse_2: Perhaps those who disbelieve would like to become Muslims.
verse.verse_3: Leave them to eat, and enjoy, and be lulled by hope. They will find out.
verse.verse_4: We have never destroyed a town unless it had a set time.
verse.verse_5: No nation can bring its time forward, nor can they delay it.
verse.verse_6: And they said, "O you who received the message, you are insane."
verse.verse_7: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you are truthful?"
verse.verse_8: We do not send the angels down except with reason, and they will not be held back.
verse.verse_9: Surely We revealed the Message, and We will surely preserve it.
verse.verse_10: We sent others before you, to the former communities.
verse.verse_11: But no messenger came to them, but they ridiculed him.
verse.verse_12: Thus We slip it into the hearts of the guilty.
verse.verse_13: They do not believe in it, though the ways of the ancients have passed away.
verse.verse_14: Even if We opened for them a gateway into the sky, and they began to ascend through it.
verse.verse_15: They would still say, "Our eyes are hallucinating; in fact, we are people bewitched."
verse.verse_16: We placed constellations in the sky, and made them beautiful to the beholders.
verse.verse_17: And We guarded them from every outcast devil.
verse.verse_18: Except one who steals a hearing, and is followed by a visible projectile.
verse.verse_19: We spread the earth, and placed stabilizers in it, and in it We grew all things in proper measure.
verse.verse_20: And in it We created livelihoods for you, and for those for whom you are not the providers.
verse.verse_21: There is not a thing but with Us are its stores, and We send it down only in precise measure.
verse.verse_22: We send the fertilizing winds; and send down water from the sky, and give it to you to drink, and you are not the ones who store it.
verse.verse_23: It is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritors.
verse.verse_24: And We know those of you who go forward, and We know those who lag behind.
verse.verse_25: It is your Lord who will gather them together. He is the Wise, the Knowing.
verse.verse_26: We created the human being from clay, from molded mud.
verse.verse_27: And the jinn We created before, from piercing fire.
verse.verse_28: Your Lord said to the angels, "I am creating a human being from clay, from molded mud."
verse.verse_29: "When I have formed him, and breathed into him of My spirit, fall down prostrating before him."
verse.verse_30: So the angels prostrated themselves, all together.
verse.verse_31: Except for Satan. He refused to be among those who prostrated themselves.
verse.verse_32: He said, "O Satan, what kept you from being among those who prostrated themselves?"
verse.verse_33: He said, "I am not about to prostrate myself before a human being, whom You created from clay, from molded mud."
verse.verse_34: He said, "Then get out of here, for you are an outcast".
verse.verse_35: "And the curse will be upon you until the Day of Judgment."
verse.verse_36: He said, "My Lord, reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
verse.verse_37: He said, "You are of those reprieved."
verse.verse_38: "Until the Day of the time appointed."
verse.verse_39: He said, "My Lord, since You have lured me away, I will glamorize for them on earth, and I will lure them all away."
verse.verse_40: "Except for Your sincere servants among them."
verse.verse_41: He said, "This is a right way with Me."
verse.verse_42: "Over My servants you have no authority, except for the sinners who follow you."
verse.verse_43: And Hell is the meeting-place for them all.
verse.verse_44: "It has seven doors; for each door is an assigned class."
verse.verse_45: But the righteous will be in gardens with springs.
verse.verse_47: And We will remove all ill-feelings from their hearts-brothers and sisters, on couches facing one another.
verse.verse_48: No fatigue will ever touch them therein, nor will they be asked to leave it.
verse.verse_49: Inform My servants that I am the Forgiver, the Merciful.
verse.verse_50: And that My punishment is the painful punishment.
verse.verse_51: And inform them of the guests of Abraham.
verse.verse_52: When they entered upon him, and said, "Peace." He said, "We are wary of you."
verse.verse_53: They said, "Do not fear; we bring you good news of a boy endowed with knowledge."
verse.verse_54: He said, "Do you bring me good news, when old age has overtaken me? What good news do you bring?"
verse.verse_55: They said, "We bring you good news in truth, so do not despair."
verse.verse_56: He said, "And who despairs of his Lord's mercy but the lost?"
verse.verse_57: He said, "So what is your business, O envoys?"
verse.verse_58: They said, "We were sent to a sinful people."
verse.verse_59: "Except for the family of Lot; we will save them all."
verse.verse_60: "Except for his wife." We have determined that she will be of those who lag behind.
verse.verse_61: And when the envoys came to the family of Lot.
verse.verse_62: He said, "You are a people unknown to me."
verse.verse_63: They said, "We bring you what they have doubts about."
verse.verse_64: "We bring you the truth, and we are truthful."
verse.verse_65: "Travel with your family at the dead of the night, and follow up behind them, and let none of you look back, and proceed as commanded."
verse.verse_66: And We informed him of Our decree: the last remnant of these will be uprooted by early morning.
verse.verse_67: And the people of the town came joyfully.
verse.verse_68: He said, "These are my guests, so do not embarrass me."
verse.verse_69: "And fear God, and do not disgrace me."
verse.verse_70: They said, "Did we not forbid you from strangers?"
verse.verse_71: He said, "These are my daughters, if you must."
verse.verse_72: By your life, they were blundering in their drunkenness.
verse.verse_73: So the Blast struck them at sunrise.
verse.verse_74: And We turned it upside down, and rained down upon them stones of baked clay.
verse.verse_75: Surely in that are lessons for those who read signs.
verse.verse_76: And it is on an existing road.
verse.verse_77: Surely in that is a sign for the believers.
verse.verse_78: The people of the Woods were also wrongdoers.
verse.verse_79: So We took revenge upon them. Both are clearly documented.
verse.verse_80: The people of the Rock also rejected the messengers.
verse.verse_81: We gave them Our revelations, but they turned away from them.
verse.verse_82: They used to carve homes in the mountains, feeling secure.
verse.verse_83: But the Blast struck them in the morning.
verse.verse_84: All they had acquired was of no avail to them.
verse.verse_85: We did not create the heavens and the earth, and what lies between them, except with truth. The Hour is coming, so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
verse.verse_86: Your Lord is the All-Knowing Creator.
verse.verse_87: We have given you seven of the pairs, and the Grand Quran.
verse.verse_88: Do not extend your eyes towards what We have bestowed on some couples of them to enjoy, and do not grieve over them, and lower your wing to the believers.
verse.verse_89: And say, "I am the clear warner."
verse.verse_90: Just as We sent down to the separatists.
verse.verse_91: Those who made the Quran obsolete.
verse.verse_92: By your Lord, we will question them all.
verse.verse_93: About what they used to do.
verse.verse_94: So proclaim openly what you are commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.
verse.verse_95: We are enough for you against the mockers.
verse.verse_96: Those who set up another god with God. They will come to know.
verse.verse_97: We are aware that your heart is strained by what they say.
verse.verse_98: So glorify the praise of your Lord, and be among those who bow down.
verse.verse_99: And worship your Lord in order to attain certainty.
